ValidationRule.description: Helpline Agents should not be able to edit an Application unless it is in Draft, New, or Needs Information Statuses.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Permission.Helpline_Application_Permission, NOT( $Permission.Patient_Navigation_Management ), NOT( OR( ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c ,"Draft"), ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c ,"New"), ISPICKVAL(Application_Status__c ,"Need More Information") ) ), !$Setup.Bypass__c.Validation__c, LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "all", LOWER($Setup.Bypass__c.SObject__c) <> "application__c" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Edits cannot be made to the Application in this Status. Please contact a manager if changes need to be made.
